data.comment: The match is underway in Seongnam.
Throw-in Seoul.
In the minute 3, Park Tae-jun of Seongnam smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Seoul at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Seoul.
Kim Nam-chun's header is off-target for Seoul.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Seoul.
Byung jin Park awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Lee Jae-won is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Free kick Seoul.
In the minute 14, Jamshid Iskanderov (Seongnam) has replaced the possibly injured Lee Jae-won.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 15, In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Seongnam capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jung Hyun-cheol for Seoul has been booked by Byung jin Park and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 17, Byung jin Park waits before resuming play because Tomislav Kis for Seongnam is still down.
In Seongnam Seongnam drive forward through Kim Dong-hyeon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Tomislav Kis returns to the field for Seongnam after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 19, Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Byung jin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Seoul to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Seoul.
In the minute 27, Yun Ju-tae scores to make it 0-1 at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Byung jin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 36, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Seoul.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Seoul.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
Seongnam are pushing forward but Park Tae-jun's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 38, Seoul have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Hwang Hyun-soo (Seoul) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Seongnam to check on Kim Won-sik, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Seoul's Kim Won-sik is back in action after a slight knock.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a Seongnam throw-in in Seoul's half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
Tomislav Kis (Seongnam) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 45, Great play from Lee Tae-heui to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Byung jin Park signals a Seongnam throw-in in Seoul's half.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Seongnam's Tomislav Kis is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
In Seongnam, Im Seung-kyeom (Seongnam) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 51, Byung jin Park awards Seoul a goal kick.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Throw-in for Seoul at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Seongnam.
Throw-in Seoul.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 54, Seongnam push upfield and Tomislav Kis gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Seoul defence.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Seongnam's Tomislav Kis misses with an attempt on goal.
Seoul have a goal kick.
Choi Yong Soo is making the team's first substitution at Tancheon Sports Complex with Jo Yeong-uk replacing Kim Jin-ya.
The home team replace Na Sangho with Kim Hyeon-seong.
In the minute 60, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kim Won-sik.
Kim Won-sik is back on the pitch.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
Se Jong Ju is replacing Kim Won-sik for the away team.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Yu In-soo (Seongnam) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, The away team have replaced Jung Han-min with Park Chu-young. This is the second substitution made today by Choi Yong Soo.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 70, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Seoul.
Yun Ju-tae is on target to give Seoul a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 71, Han Seung-gyu with an assist there.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In the minute 76, Yang Dong-hyeon is on a sub for Tomislav Kis for Seongnam.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam drives forward and Kim Dong-hyeon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 79, Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Seongnam Seongnam's Yang Dong-hyeon is caught offside.
Throw-in for Seoul close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Seoul.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
In the minute 85, Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Seoul have a goal kick.
Yu In-soo (Seongnam) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Seongnam surge into the attack at Tancheon Sports Complex but Kim Hyeon-seongâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Byung jin Park will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Seongnam drive forward but Yang Dong-hyeon is judged offside.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Seongnam.
Lee Chang-yong gets his shot on target but fails to score for Seongnam.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
